beforeShellExecution.command: bash -lc 'dir="$PWD"; while [ "$dir" != "/" ] && [ ! -x "$dir/.cursor/hooks/gastown-shell.sh" ]; do dir=$(dirname "$dir"); done; "$dir/.cursor/hooks/gastown-shell.sh" before'

afterShellExecution.command: bash -lc 'dir="$PWD"; while [ "$dir" != "/" ] && [ ! -x "$dir/.cursor/hooks/gastown-shell.sh" ]; do dir=$(dirname "$dir"); done; "$dir/.cursor/hooks/gastown-shell.sh" after'
